sentences.en: But through it all you have always been my Valentine.
sentences.cn: 但经历过这一切的甘与苦,你终究是我的爱人.

sentences.en: But Valentine continued to perform marriage ceremonies for young lovers in secret.
sentences.cn: 但是瓦伦丁继续秘密地为年轻的爱人们举行结婚仪式.

sentences.en: Dealing with Valentine was like dealing with a king.
sentences.cn: 跟瓦伦丁来往就象跟国王来往.

sentences.en: His essay is a valentine to London.
sentences.cn: 他那篇散文是为怀念伦敦而写的.

sentences.en: I was thinking more on the lines of First Officer to Captain Valentine.
sentences.cn: 我是在考虑从大副到船长的一系列职务.

sentences.en: It's a long story. Valentine is a priest. People celebrate that day in memory of him.
sentences.cn: 这说来可就话长了. Valentine是个牧师, 人们庆祝那天是为了纪念他.

sentences.en: Jimmy Valentine put on his coat and walked toward the front door.
sentences.cn: 基米穿上大衣,向前门走去.

sentences.en: Now four days had elapsed, and Valentine still lived.
sentences.cn: 现在,四天过去了, 而瓦朗蒂娜依旧还活着.

sentences.en: She was working on Valentine's Day so we're celebrating it tonight.
sentences.cn: 她那天工作来着,我们今晚庆祝.

sentences.en: The lovesick St. British excel themselves each Valentine's Day.
sentences.cn: 每年圣瓦伦丁节,患相思病的英国人都表现出色.

sentences.en: To my one and only Valentine: I love you.
sentences.cn: 献给我惟一的爱人: 我爱你.

sentences.en: Valentine carried the pastille to her mouth, and swallowed it.
sentences.cn: 瓦朗蒂娜把药丸放进嘴里, 咽了下去.

sentences.en: Valentine was beheaded on February 14 th.
sentences.cn: 华伦谭神父在二月十四日被斩首.

sentences.en: Valentine witnessed this scene with a sentiment of stupefaction.
sentences.cn: 瓦朗蒂娜茫然地望着眼前这一切.

sentences.en: You have been and still are my only true Valentine.
sentences.cn: 从过去到现在,你一直是我惟一真正爱恋的人.

trans.tran_cn: 情人，心爱的人，在情人节（二月十四日）赠送给情人的礼物（或情人卡）
trans.tran_en: someone you love or think is attractive, that you send a card to on St Valentine’s Day
